A

addInjectionBinder(InjectionBinder) - Method in class net.nova_project.backend.injection.InjectionHandler
This method collects InjectionBinder's witch collects configuration information (primarily bindings) to configure the InjectionHandler, which is then able to provide them with bindings.
ALL - net.nova_project.backend.logging.NovaLogLevel
All events should be logged.

B

bindInjections(Binder) - Method in interface net.nova_project.backend.injection.InjectionBinder
Collects configuration information (primarily bindings) which will be used to configure the InjectionHandler.
Bootstrap - Class in net.nova_project.backend
This is the main entry point class of the Nova Backend, is contains the Bootstrap.main(String[]) method, witch is executed first on the bootstrap process.

C

checkPrivateUnsupportedOperationConstructor(Class<?>) - Static method in class net.nova_project.backend.tests.RefectionUtils

createBindings(Stage) - Method in class net.nova_project.backend.injection.InjectionHandler
This method trigger the internal Guice registration for all before in InjectionHandler.addInjectionBinder(InjectionBinder) configured bindings.

InjectionBinder - Interface in net.nova_project.backend.injection
This interface provide the method InjectionBinder.bindInjections(com.google.inject.Binder) to collects configuration information (primarily bindings) which will be used to configure the InjectionHandler.
